name: Gentlemen's Puzzle Club
description:
We invite you to immerse yourself in the exploring the world of puzzles, where you can assemble images of beautiful girls. Each girl is represented as a puzzle, composed of various pieces that come together to form her complete picture. You will encounter enchanting characters with different personalities and moods – from charming maids to noble aristocrats.



What you can expect from our game:

  • A variety of wonderful girls
  • 28 different puzzles
  • Beautiful music for relaxation


We sincerely appreciate your support for this game. If you enjoyed playing it, we would be grateful if you could share your experience with others. Thank you once again!
